p:
The concentrations of antibiotics represent their minimum inhibitory concentration (MIC) and the two antibiotics were selected for their potencies to clear the gut microbiota of C. maculatus based on the colony forming units (CFU) of gut homogenates (Supplementary 1). In each treatment group, the artificial cowpea seeds were left undisturbed for 24â€‰h and equilibrated with atmospheric moisture, prior to coating with 10% gelatin
55 . The preparation procedures were carried out under aseptic conditions. The artificial cowpea seeds were air-dried under a laminar flow hood and packaged in plastic bag until use for bioassays.
